{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05120v1", "title": "The intersections of the lower central series and the subgroups of
  finite p-index of Generalized Baumslag-Solitar tree groups", "summary": "For a Generalized Baumslag-Solitar group $G$ with underling graph a tree, we
calculate the intersection $\gamma_{\omega}(G)$ of the lower central series and
the intersection $(N_{p})_{\omega}(G)$ of the subgroups of finite index some
power of a prime $p$.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR", "published": "2025-04-07T14:25:59Z"}
